name: Matteo Leonetti
content: Matteo Leonetti | King's College London Skip to main contentDr Matteo Leonetti Senior Lecturer in Computer ScienceResearch interestsComputer scienceContact detailsmatteo.leonetti@kcl.ac.ukBiographyMatteo received his PhD in Computer Engineering from Sapienza University of Rome. Before joining King's he was a lecturer at the University of Leeds, a post-doc at the University of Texas at Austin, and a post-doc at the Italian Institute of Technology.Research interests Reinforcement Learning Planning and Reasoning Autonomous Robots Further information Google Scholar Research Gate PublicationsResearchResearchHealth HubThe Health Hub centres on computational characterisation of medically relevant study cases and data. Reasoning and PlanningThe group focuses on the fundamental AI challenge of creating, representing and reasoning.
